short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Relay Autobooker and Autorefresher by Cardamon for the Amazon Relay load board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Amazon Relay Dashboard experience with Amazon Relay AutoBooker and Amazon AutoRefresher by Cardamon!
🏷️ 50% off for the first month - use the coupon code below!

❗ NEW in version 7.7
✔️ Android Devices Support!
✔️ Improved error handling for the Load Board.
✔️ Added a 10-15 sec delay for every customizable refresh cycle.
✔️ UI updated.
✔️ Load Board updates supported.

Features:
🔸 Auto-refresh load list based on set filters
🔸 Customizable refresh delays
🔸 Auto-book and auto-confirm first load found
🔸 Multiple browser tab support
🔸 Visual and audio notifications
🔸 Skipping similar loads
🔸 Max Stops filter
🔸 Compatible with Amazon Relay load board for US, UK, FR, IT, DE, IN, PL, CZ, JP, ES, CA
🔸 Human-like behavior mode with random refresh delays
🔸 Stop on new loads mode
🔸 Stop on payout change mode
🔸 Fast Confirm buttons mode for quick load confirmation
🔸 Different notification sounds when auto operations are disabled

Visit the Autobooker Cardamon site  🌐 https://cardamon.org/products/relay-autobooker/

New users of Amazon Relay Booker receive a 50% discount for the first month! Use the coupon code 'NEWUSER50' at checkout.

Support email: support@cardamon.org
